name: Dheeraj Kumar Sidana
body: ### About me I am Software engineer, based in India with expertise in Java, Scalable Web Applications, Data Mining. I have done M.Tech. from CSE Deptt., IIT Bombay and B.Tech.(IT) from NIT Jaipur. ### Tweets by @dksidana ### Contact dksidana (AT) gmail.com
